title: WhatsApp Messages
subtitle: Send WhatsApp messages to selected users

tips.tip1: Use templates to speed up sending common messages
tips.tip2: The variable {{nome}} will be automatically replaced by each recipient's name
tips.tip3: Only users with a registered phone number can receive messages
tips.tip4: You can edit templates before sending to customize the message

success.allFailed: Failed to send message to all {{count}} recipient(s)

message.label: Message
message.placeholder:
Type your message here...

You can use the following variable:
{{nome}} - User name

Example:
Hello, {{nome}}! Welcome to the platform.
